com.bhaptics.ble.client

Class BaseClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bhaptics.ble.client.BaseClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TactosyClient

    public abstract class BaseClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Client to communicate with BaseBLEService

    This client binds to BaseBLEService and exchange their Messenger

    ClientHandler should be specified to receive tactosies' callbacks (through service).

    If more callbacks (after binding to service) is needed, call addOnReadyListener(OnReadyListener)
